meanings.definition: Having comb-like projections on the edge, as certain fish scales.
meanings.sent1: The ctenoid scales on the fish were rough to the touch.
meanings.sent2: The scientist studied the ctenoid scales under a microscope.
meanings.sent3: The ctenoid scales on the fish made it look like it had a fancy haircut.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter was ctenoid, spreading joy like tiny combs in the air.
meanings.sent5: The ctenoid scales shimmered in the sunlight, creating a beautiful pattern.
